channel.title: Timers
channel.description: Hi guys, I was just wondering, my friend has a allstar based server and I thought pking is messed up because if you click twice you eat twice and only get health for 1 food. Anyway I wanted to know how to add a timer to food. Any help will be gladly appreciated :D.

item.title: Timers
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:2, topic:257345”]case x: if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && actionTimer <= 0) { healing[1] = x; healing[2] = x; healing[3] = -1; actionTimer = x; sendMessage("You eat the --"); }[/quote]
Oh lord.

Read full topic

item.title: Timers
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:2, topic:257345”]case x: if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && actionTimer <= 0) { healing[1] = x; healing[2] = x; healing[3] = -1; actionTimerTimer = x; sendMessage("You eat the --"); }[/quote]All my life of playing RuneScape and RSPS, I’ve never seen a food named --.
Other then that, it does work. And the action timer works on other things too.

Read full topic

item.title: Timers

item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

case x: if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && actionTimer <= 0) { healing[1] = x; healing[2] = x; healing[3] = -1; actionTimer = x; sendMessage("You eat the --"); }
